apps.name: Classic Player
apps.subtitle: Turn your iPhone into an iPod Classic.
apps.versionDescription: Updated with support for Swift 4, Fixed bug where selecting a song would cause a different song to play, Fixed bug where time remaining/elapsed labels would show incorrect values, Removed support for iOS 9 (will be re-added later), Support for iOS 10 - iOS 13
apps.localizedDescription: An iPod Classic simulator for iOS

permissions.usageDescription: Classic Player needs access to your music library to control your music.

apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
Delta, meet melonDS! melonDS is a modern Nintendo DS emulator that is more accurate and reliable than DeSmuME. melonDS is actively being worked on and supports many features DeSmuME does not, which is why Delta now includes a melonDS emulator core ðŸŽ‰ melonDS will soon become the default, so please report any issues you find! 

NEW FEATURES
â€¢ New core based on melonDS for DS emulation (will soon become the default)
â€¢ DS settings screen to switch cores and import melonDS BIOS files
â€¢ Fast forward DS games
â€¢ Action Replay cheat codes for DS games (melonDS core)
â€¢ Boot directly to Nintendo DS home screen and change system settings (melonDS core)
â€¢ Access Delta files directory in Files > On My iPhone > Delta
â€¢ Support for 8-character NES Game Genie cheat codes
â€¢ Export save files for games from context menu

BUG FIXES
â€¢ Fixes graphical issues when playing DS games
â€¢ Fixes incorrect formatting when entering cheat codes
â€¢ Fixes incorrect game name text color after deleting a game or switching cores
â€¢ Fixes save files being overwritten when previewing games

Switching to melonDS has been a _big_ transition, so please report any and all bugs you find using the melonDS core. Enjoy!
apps.localizedDescription:
The next console for Delta is coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing DS games!

DS support currently includes:
â€¢ Playing DS games
â€¢ Save States
â€¢ Hold Button

Features I'm still working on:
â€¢ Fast Forward
â€¢ Cheats
â€¢ Controller skin (using placeholder controller skin for now)

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: MAME4iOS
apps.subtitle: This is a port of MAME 0.139u1 for iOS, iPadOS, and tvOS.
apps.versionDescription:
Better INFO/HISTORY.DAT display in landscape (and tvOS). 
â€¢ Fixed tvOS MAME top shelf wide logo.
apps.localizedDescription: MAME stands for Multi Arcade Machine Emulator, and lets you play arcade games from the past 30+ years on a device that fits in your pocket! .

apps.name: Play!
apps.subtitle: PlayStation 2 Games on iOS.
apps.localizedDescription:
Play! is a portable PlayStation2 emulator. The focus of the project is on making PlayStation2 emulation easy and accessible. Just pop in your favorite game's disc and have fun!

â€¢ No BIOS required. Play! is an high-level emulator.
â€¢ Easy configuration. No custom settings to fix specific games.
â€¢ Available on many platforms. Making sure the experience is the same everywhere.

apps.name: PPSSPP
apps.subtitle: PlayStation Portable Games on iOS.
apps.localizedDescription:
PPSSPP allows you to play PSP games on your iOS devices.

Enhance your experience!
â€¢ Play in HD resolutions and more
â€¢ Play on a tablet for big-screen mobile gaming
â€¢ Customize on-screen touch controls or use an external controller or keyboard
â€¢ Save and restore game state anywhere, anytime
â€¢ Crank up the anisotropic filtering and texture scaling
â€¢ Continue where you left off by transferring saves from your real PSP
